title: `x.py check` fails for rustc/rustdoc

labels.name: T-bootstrap
labels.description: Relevant to the bootstrap subteam: Rust's build system (x.py and src/bootstrap)

body:
Today I tried to run `x.py check src/tools/rustdoc` and received the following output:

```console
$ ./x.py check src/tools/rustdoc
    Finished dev [unoptimized] target(s) in 0.0 secs
Checking rustdoc artifacts (x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu -> x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu)
Checking rustdoc artifacts (x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu -> x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu)
   Compiling libc v0.2.40
   Compiling bitflags v0.9.1
error[E0463]: can't find crate for `std`

error: aborting due to previous error

For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0463`.
error: Could not compile `libc`.

Caused by:
  process didn't exit successfully: `/home/misdreavus/git/rust/build/bootstrap/debug/rustc --crate-name libc /home/misdreavus/.cargo/registry/src/githu
b.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/libc-0.2.40/src/lib.rs --error-format json --crate-type lib --emit=dep-info,metadata -C debug-assertions=off -C overflow-checks=
on --cfg feature="default" --cfg feature="use_std" -C metadata=ed02443a93d1eccc -C extra-filename=-ed02443a93d1eccc --out-dir /home/misdreavus/git/rust
/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-tools/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/deps --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu -L dependency=/home/misdreavus/git
/rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-tools/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/deps -L dependency=/home/misdreavus/git/rust/build/x86_64-unknown-li
nux-gnu/stage0-tools/release/deps --cap-lints allow` (exit code: 101)
warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish...
error[E0463]: can't find crate for `core`

error: aborting due to previous error

For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0463`.
error: Could not compile `bitflags`.

Caused by:
  process didn't exit successfully: `/home/misdreavus/git/rust/build/bootstrap/debug/rustc --crate-name bitflags /home/misdreavus/.cargo/registry/src/g
ithub.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/bitflags-0.9.1/src/lib.rs --error-format json --crate-type lib --emit=dep-info,metadata -C debug-assertions=off -C overflow-
checks=on --cfg feature="default" --cfg feature="example_generated" -C metadata=5a81f943b20a42e4 -C extra-filename=-5a81f943b20a42e4 --out-dir /home/mi
sdreavus/git/rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-tools/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/deps --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu -L dependency=/ho
me/misdreavus/git/rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-tools/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/deps -L dependency=/home/misdreavus/git/rust/build/
x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-tools/release/deps --cap-lints allow` (exit code: 101)
command did not execute successfully: "/home/misdreavus/git/rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0/bin/cargo" "check" "--target" "x86_64-unknown-li
nux-gnu" "-j" "2" "--release" "--manifest-path" "/home/misdreavus/git/rust/src/tools/rustdoc/Cargo.toml" "--message-format" "json"
expected success, got: exit code: 101
thread 'main' panicked at 'cargo must succeed', bootstrap/compile.rs:1091:9
note: Run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace.
failed to run: /home/misdreavus/git/rust/build/bootstrap/debug/bootstrap check src/tools/rustdoc
Build completed unsuccessfully in 0:00:04
```

The "compilation" process fails because it doesn't have `std` or `core` handy.

Oddly enough, i get similar failures when i check a compiler crate, but *not* when i check std or core themselves.
